data.title: System Lifecycle Management: Engineering Digitalization (Engineering 4.0) [1st ed. 2021] 3658338733, 9783658338732
data.meta_description: Years of experience in the area of Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) in industry, research and education form the basis...
